title: Google\Cloud\Filestore\V1\RestoreInstanceRequest
name: RestoreInstanceRequest
description:
RestoreInstanceRequest restores an existing instances's file share from a backup.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.filestore.v1.RestoreInstanceRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The resource name of the instance, in the format projects/{project_number}/locations/{location_id}/instances/{instance_id}.

params.name: data.file_share
params.description: Required. Name of the file share in the Cloud Filestore instance that the backup is being restored to.

params.name: data.source_backup
params.description: The resource name of the backup, in the format projects/{project_number}/locations/{location_id}/backups/{backup_id}.
